mapper.select: select count(member_id) as emailCount from tbl_member where member_email = #{email};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(member_nickname, member_email, member_desc, member_password, member_profile, member_address, member_grade) values (#{member_nickname}, #{member_email}, #{member_desc}, #{member_password}, #{member_profile}, #{member_address}, #{member_grade});
mapper.select: select member_id, member_nickname, member_email, member_desc, member_password, member_profile, member_address, member_date, member_grade from tbl_member where member_email = #{email} and member_password = #{password};
select member_id, member_nickname, member_email, member_desc, member_password, member_profile, member_address, member_date, member_grade from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId}
